sentence.Network_en: We should not be softhearted towards hardened criminals.
sentence.Network_cn: 对怙恶不悛的犯罪分子不能心慈手软.

sentence.Network_en: The sight of an animal in tears always makes me feel queer and softhearted.
sentence.Network_cn: 一看到动物哭哭啼啼,我就于心不忍,心慈手软起来.

sentence.Network_en: Though he didn't love her, he had become softhearted because of her. It's just too unfair!
sentence.Network_cn: 自己不爱她, 而偏为她弄得心软, 这太不公道!

entry.def: Someone who is soft-hearted has a very sympathetic and kind nature.

means.word_mean: 1. easily moved to pity or sorrow;

auth_sentence.content: Instead, the doubters tend to be softhearted dupes.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead, the doubters tend to be softhearted dupes.

auth_sentence.content: They say John got the gun and took the hound down the field but he hadn't the heart to shoot him, the softhearted fool.
